6844.quoteText:
We use cookies, beacons, tags, scripts and other similar technologies, such as CI codes (click tracking), ISC (source tracking), and ITC (item tracking codes).
We also automatically collect information about device's operating system, phone model, device ID and customer number.
6844.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

6845.quoteText: To Personalize Advertising and Marketing: to provide targeted and interest based offers we conduct data profiling based on your characteristics, behavior and preferences (based on the information you provide to us, your interactions with the ISODME Platform and its Users, information obtained from third parties, and your search history).
